title: conqueror karma boarder
body: does the conqueror boarder only come with the bundle or will i get it for just getting the skin.

replies.body: I believe the special border for Conqueror Karma is tied to the icon specifically. If you were to gift any of those items, they won't be added onto *your* account so you won't get the border. In order to get the frame for yourself, you will have to buy the bundle or get the icon on your own account.
